body:
In v0.19.1, importing a `pk()` descriptor resulted in a `pkh()` descriptor being imported into the wallet with the p2pkh base58 address:

```
$ bitcoin-cli importmulti '[{"desc":"pk(0279be667ef9dcbbac55a06295ce870b07029bfcdb2dce28d959f2815b16f81798)#gn28ywm7","watchonly":true,"timestamp":0}]'

$ getaddressinfo mrCDrCybB6J1vRfbwM5hemdJz73FwDBC8r
{
  "address": "mrCDrCybB6J1vRfbwM5hemdJz73FwDBC8r",
  "scriptPubKey": "76a914751e76e8199196d454941c45d1b3a323f1433bd688ac",
  "ismine": false,
  "solvable": true,
  "desc": "pkh([751e76e8]0279be667ef9dcbbac55a06295ce870b07029bfcdb2dce28d959f2815b16f81798)#6ewytvca",
  "iswatchonly": false,
  "isscript": false,
  "iswitness": false,
  "pubkey": "0279be667ef9dcbbac55a06295ce870b07029bfcdb2dce28d959f2815b16f81798",
  "iscompressed": true,
  "label": "",
  "ischange": false,
  "timestamp": 0,
  "hdkeypath": "m",
  "hdseedid": "0000000000000000000000000000000000000000",
  "hdmasterfingerprint": "751e76e8",
  "labels": [ { "name": "", "purpose": "receive" }
  ]
}
```

I would consider this an unexpected behavior (p2pk should have no address format), but its somewhat consistent with `deriveaddresses` returning p2pkh addresses for `pk()` descriptors (which itself also seems wrong?).

Beginning in v0.20, it appears like the p2pkh address is still being added to the wallet, but without any associated descriptor information and with `solvable` being reported as `false`:

```
$ bitcoin-cli importmulti '[{"desc":"pk(0279be667ef9dcbbac55a06295ce870b07029bfcdb2dce28d959f2815b16f81798)#gn28ywm7","watchonly":true,"label":"L","timestamp":0}]'

$ bitcoin-cli getaddressesbylabel L
{
  "mrCDrCybB6J1vRfbwM5hemdJz73FwDBC8r": {
    "purpose": "receive"
  }
}

$ bitcoin-cli getaddressinfo mrCDrCybB6J1vRfbwM5hemdJz73FwDBC8r
{
  "address": "mrCDrCybB6J1vRfbwM5hemdJz73FwDBC8r",
  "scriptPubKey": "76a914751e76e8199196d454941c45d1b3a323f1433bd688ac",
  "ismine": false,
  "solvable": false,
  "iswatchonly": false,
  "isscript": false,
  "iswitness": false,
  "ischange": false,
  "labels": [
    "L"
  ]
}
```

Which seems even more unexpected. Also of note is that `iswatchonly` is reported as `false`, for both v0.19 and v0.20.
title: Strange behaviour when importing `pk()` descriptors, changed from 0.19 to 0.20
